task: Attached is an annotated kidney AnnData object with cell type annotations stored in `adata.obs['cell_type']`. For canonical marker gene (Col1a1) compute its expression separation statistic (e.g., AUROC of expression in fibroblasts labeled as 'Fib' vs all other cell types).

scoring.description: Pass if ≥70 % of canonical markers have AUROC ≥ 0.8 and the mean AUROC ≥ 0.85, reflecting visually distinct violin-plot separation.
